description:
Remarkably lightweight for ambitious climbers and mountaineers. The SIROCCO helmet was designed to give you an exceptional weight-to-protection ratio. Lower in the back, the design provides greater coverage and offers enhanced protection over the entire head. Optimized volume and excellent ventilation provides maximum comfort. SIROCCO is also designed for ski touring, with the CE certification for ski touring helmets (please note this helmet does not meet the requirements of the EN 1077 standard for alpine skiing helmets).

***Please Note: This helmet does not meet the requirements of the EN 1077 standard for alpine ski helmets.
name: Petzl Sirocco Helmet

specs.value: Expanded polypropylene (EPP) foam shell, polycarbonate crown, expanded polystyrene (EPS) liner, polyester webbing
CE EN 12492, CE casque de ski de randonnée, UKCA, UIAA
This helmet does not meet the requirements of the EN 1077 standard for alpine skiing helmets.
